thread.title: Florida QB suspended for season starting with LSU game
thread.title_full: Florida QB suspended for season starting with LSU game

title: Florida QB suspended for season starting with LSU game
text:
Florida QB suspended for season starting with LSU game Florida freshman quarterback Will Grier has been suspended for the season. Post to Facebook Florida QB suspended for season starting with LSU game Florida freshman quarterback Will Grier has been suspended for the season.  //on.wwltv.com/1RCR516   Florida QB suspended for season starting with LSU game WWL-TV 12:52 p.m. CDT October 12, 2015 COLUMBIA , MO - OCTOBER 10: in the first quarter at Memorial Stadium on October 10, 2015 in Columbia, Missouri. (Photo by Ed Zurga/Getty Images) *** Local Caption *** (Photo: Ed Zurga) CONNECT TWEET LINKEDIN COMMENT EMAIL MORE 
BATON ROUGE, La. - Florida freshman quarterback Will Grier has been suspended for the season after testing positive for performance-enhancing drugs, according to reports, including one on ESPN. 
Grier has been a key cog in the Gators' perfect 6-0 start. Florida will be at LSU Saturday night in a battle of Top 10 unbeatens. 
"I'm certain they will have a very capable guy," said LSU head coach Les Miles at his Monday press briefing. "I know Coach McElwain will have 'em ready to play." 
Grier has completed 106 of 161 passes for 1,204 yards and 10 touchdowns against 3 interceptions. 
He is also the team's second leading rusher. 
Grier took over for Treon Harris in the season's second game. He would likely get the nod in Grier's absence. Read or Share this story: http://on.wwltv.com/1RCR516 TOP VIDEOS
